page.title: 07TIBETAN TEACHINGS
page.content: The Samye Ling Tibetan Centre and its teachings are under the direct spiritual authority of the head of the {Kagyu} tradition of Buddhism. Visiting teachers , often the most advanced Lamas of their tradition , lead study courses at Christmas , Easter and Tibetan New Year , and also during the summer from july to september.From time to time qualified teachers from other religions visit the centre to give instruction.Both religious and meditation instruction is given most of the year. On a hill nearby a retreat house facility exists where students can spend periods of time in complete solitude in order to stabilise their practice.
